description: Predict traffic accident severity using advanced machine learning and explainable AI, enhancing road safety with clear insights from comprehensive data analysis.

This project is a comprehensive cybersecurity solution that focuses on detecting phishing websites and analyzing DDoS attacks through simulation. It combines Machine Learning, Real-Time Web Application Monitoring, and Load Balancerbased attack simulation to create an end-to-end security framework.
This repository is the official repository of the paper "A Unified Framework for Inference with General Missingness Patterns and Machine Learning Imputation".
Machine learning framework for both deep learning and traditional algorithms
CatBench - Benchmark Framework of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials in Adsorption Energy Predictions

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.

Master Thesis Project  Development of a machine learningdriven framework for distortion-aware power allocation in 6G MIMO-OFDM transmitters. The project integrates deep learning and communication theory to optimize transmit power, mitigate EVM distortion, and enhance energy efficiency under nonlinear PA constraints.
Keep track of the newest machine learning frameworks on GitHub

Build a credit risk prediction model and apply SHAP and LIME to explain global and local decisions. Compare both methods, analyze discrepancies, and produce an interpretable, regulator-friendly explanation framework for fair and transparent loan approvals.

A real-time Digital Twin framework for Predictive Maintenance (PdM) of rotating machinery. Uses MQTT for live sensor data streaming, Streamlit for dashboard visualization, and Machine Learning models (Random Forest/LSTM) to predict Remaining Useful Life (RUL) and detect anomalies.

A comprehensive machine learning project for credit risk assessment and Expected Credit Loss (ECL) calculation using synthetic loan data. This project implements Basel-compliant credit risk frameworks including Probability of Default (PD), Loss Given Default (LGD), Exposure at Default (EAD), and Expected Credit Loss (ECL) modeling.
Machine Learning framework for predicting mental-health risk from social-media text with sentiment analysis, linguistic features, TF-IDF, and carbon-emission tracking.

This project Predicts plant health using NDVI values, classifying leaves as Healthy, Unhealthy, or Dead. NDVI drives prediction, while OpenCV showcases image color and edges, and CNN (MobileNetV2) extracts features for visualization. Includes EDA plots for NDVI distribution and category analysis in a concise, educational framework.

A foundational MLOps framework designed to operationalize the machine learning lifecycle using MLflow. This project establishes a standardized pipeline for experiment tracking, model versioning, and reproducible deployment.
Python AI framework (running on both CPU and GPU) for machine learning and deep learning.

Comparative study of machine learning classifiers (KNN, Weighted KNN, MLP) for industrial steel plate fault detection. Implements feature engineering with LDA/PCA dimensionality reduction, achieving 74% sensitivity and 96% specificity. Includes comprehensive data analysis, k-means clustering, and model evaluation framework.

Flask is a lightweight, open-source Python web framework used in Data Science to deploy and manage data-driven applications. It offers a simple yet powerful structure for creating web apps and APIs that integrate with data analysis or machine learning models, providing flexibility for custom solutions.

Official implementation of our paper "Unsupervised Active Learning via Natural Feature Progressive Framework", currently under review at IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI)

A platform developed from an open framework to help AI researchers and developers to rapidly prototype, test and deploy workflows that include machine learning models as worker components. The workflow can be invoked on command line or web service, as well as integrated into UX/UI as part of a larger intelligent solution.

PanARGMiner: Pan-genomic Antimicrobial Resistance Gene Miner is a machine learning framework for selecting key antimicrobial resistance features from large-scale genomic data with high accuracy and interpretability.
sTarML: A Sequence-Based Machine Learning Framework for Predicting Bacterial sRNAmRNA Interactions
Testing the machine learning framework GFlowNet for the directed studies course at Carleton University

Machine Learning-powered multi-asset portfolio risk and return prediction framework. Combines advanced technical indicators, rolling statistics, and feature engineering to build data-driven quantitative finance models for robust portfolio optimization and risk analysis.
Translation exploration with Transformers and Machine Learning Experimentation Platfroms
DIfferentiable MOlecular Simulator (DIMOS): A pyTorch based framework for machine-learning enhanced simulations
Predictive Vulnerability Detection: Using machine learning models to predict potential vulnerabilities in Programming Languages based on SEcurity Feature Framework (SEFF) criteria
A Rust powered PyTorch-like Machine Learning framework.

Repository for the paper Machine Learning-Based Prediction and Geometric Quality Assessment in 3D Concrete Printing. Includes experimental data, preprocessing scripts, CatBoost/DecisionTree ML models, and code for printability maps and geometric quality metrics in 3DCP.
A machine learning-based video super resolution and frame interpolation framework. Est. Hack the Valley II, 2018.

Multi_Predicto is a modular machine-learning system designed to predict various real-world outcomes - from laptop and smartphone prices to commodity and cryptocurrency trends. Built for experimentation, it allows training and comparing multiple regression and ensemble models in one flexible framework.
Machine Learning Framework
NeXt4ACP is a novel stacked framework that integrates both machine learning and deep learning components for accurate ACP identification.
A reproducible machine learning framework for short-term radon activity concentration forecasting in the Campi Flegrei volcanic area

TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides strong support for various platforms, especially Linux, and is widely adopted in the industry due to its active community and production-ready capabilities.
A generalised framework for property-driven machine learning, combining input region specification via hyper-rectangles with differentiable logics to compile logical constraints into loss.
Equitrain: A Unified Framework for Training and Fine-tuning Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
Machine Learning Framework for Crystal Energy Prediction

Movie Rating Prediction   Built a machine learning model to predict how users might rate movies they havent watched yet.  Cleaned and preprocessed the rating dataset for accuracy and consistency.  Applied collaborative filtering and regression techniques to generate predictions.  Evaluated model performance using RMSE and improved results.
An ensemble Framework for Explainable Geospatial Analysis Machine Learning Models

Cross-platform benchmarking framework for evaluating machine learning models in ransomware detection across macOS, Linux, and Windows. Includes 8 ML algorithms tested on the MLRan dataset with comprehensive performance metrics.
Minimal Conversational Intelligence Framework with Memory & Reinforcement Learning

MAPRL (Multiagent Planning for Reinforcement Learning) is a framework that integrates Reward Machines (RMs) with Partial-Order Planning (POP) to enhance coordination in multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL).
ASk The RIght QUEstions: An active machine learning framework for perception experiments
MediaPipe is a cross-platform framework for building multimodal applied machine learning pipelines

A hybrid machine learning framework for short-term forecasting of Finlands aFRR (Automatic Frequency Restoration Reserve) up-regulation needs. Combines weather, market, and consumption data to predict grid balancing demand using classifierregressor ensembles for improved accuracy and insight.

A machine learning framework analyzing transportation policy impacts on urban congestion in the Philippines using Temporal Fusion Transformer models and causal inference. Features an interactive dashboard for policy simulation and includes 7,430+ observations from 12 data sources.
Framework de Machine Learning Escalable para la Vigilancia Epidemiolgica del Dengue en Colombia - Sistema de Alerta Temprana de Dengue para Cali usando XGBoost y GitHub Actions.

In this project, we developed a forecasting framework that outperforms Ternas baseline predictions by integrating statistical and machine learning models within a rolling forecasting pipeline, using ensemble averaging and systematic evaluation across multiple Italian regions

ONNX (Open Neural Network Exchange) is an open standard format for representing machine learning models. It was developed by Microsoft and Facebook to allow AI models trained in one framework to be used in another.

O `LibrasRealTime`  um projeto de Viso Computacional em tempo real que visa explorar e aplicar tcnicas de Machine Learning e Deep Learning para a deteco de gestos do alfabeto LIBRAS. Desenvolvido em Python, o projeto utiliza bibliotecas lderes da indstria como OpenCV para captura e processamento de imagens e o framework MediaPipe.

ShapeShift is a hybrid physics-informed machine learning framework for efficient mechanical simulation of MEX 3D-printed parts. It transforms computationally expensive filament-level finite element models into fast and accurate solid surrogate models.

A comprehensive, data-driven framework for optimizing shot peening processes to enhance the fatigue life of critical aerospace aluminum alloys. This project integrates Machine Learning (ML) for accurate residual stress prediction and Response Surface Methodology (RSM) for multi-objective process parameter optimization.

A multi-level obfuscation framework (mild, moderate, strong) for privacy-preserving machine learning on network-traffic data. Includes dataset balancing, obfuscation scripts, TabNet models, baseline ML benchmarks, and reproducible experiments.

Explainable AI insider threat detection system with 100% precision. Isolation Forest + SHAP framework processing 26.2GB multi-modal behavioral data (CERT/TWOS datasets). Designed for SOC analyst workflow integration.

Comparative analysis of machine learning classifiers on the UCI Bank Marketing dataset using the CRISP-DM framework. Models include Logistic Regression, KNN, Decision Tree, and SVM, with tuning and class imbalance handling for improved F1 and ROC-AUC.

This project builds an AI-powered system that predicts employee burnout risk, explains key contributing factors, and provides actionable workload optimization strategies. It combines machine learning, explainable AI (XAI), and optimization algorithms to help organizations maintain workforce health and productivity.
A framework to serve various generative AIs and other machine learning functions via WebSocket and JSONRPC.

ASEADOSSDNIoT, a novel and publicly available intrusion detection dataset supported by a fully documented hybrid testbed framework. The resulting dataset contains 457,044 labeled flow instances with 83 statistical features and was evaluated using state-of-the-art machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) techniques.

This repository documents my learning journey in Full Stack Data Science with a focus on Generative AI and Agentic AI. It includes daily tasks, hands-on projects, and experiments using Python, machine learning, and modern AI frameworks. The work reflects both foundational concepts and advanced techniques applied in real-world scenarios.

This repository serves as a hub for my ML/AI explorations, implementations, and tutorials. It includes:   Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) projects  Machine Learning models for predictions and classifications  Deep Learning projects using frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Hugging Face  Natural Language Processing (NLP) applications
Explainable machine learning framework for forecasting multi-factor risk outcomes across biological and quantitative data.
Automated modeling and machine learning framework FEDOT

modular template for building Zero-Knowledge Machine Learning systems  ZKML Blueprint is an open-source framework designed to help developers, researchers, and builders create verifiable machine learning systems using zero-knowledge proofs. It provides a structured reference architecture, example circuits, model workflows, and tools for integrating

Companion repository for the paper Threat-Driven Frameworks for Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: A Practitioners Guide (20172025). Contains benchmarking tables, framework metrics, figure sources, and reference summaries for privacy-preserving ML techniques.

A machine-learning powered web application that detects emotions from text using a trained NLP model. Includes a modern, responsive UI with emoji-based predictions, animated probability bars, dark/light mode, and real-time prediction history. Built using Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript without any frameworks.

This repository contains a collection of Python programs and Jupyter notebooks focusing on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) algorithms. It covers implementations, experiments, and hands-on code examples using popular libraries and frameworks in Python.

This repository showcases a complete machine learning project integrated with Streamlit framework for experiment tracking, model management, and reproducibility. It includes data pre-processing, model training, evaluation, and deployment-ready tracking using Streamlit.

This project contains a set of **Jupyter notebooks** to help students and data scientists deeply understand and visualize the *four main classification metrics* used in machine learning: **Accuracy, Precision, Recall, and F1 Score**.

This project implements a comprehensive machine learning framework for managing a $1 billion portfolio in the oil and gas equity sector. The system combines traditional quantitative finance with advanced deep learning techniques to optimize returns while maintaining rigorous risk controls.
Code for training and validation

Unified heuristics + machine learning framework for detecting Modbus/TCP anomalies in industrial control systems. Implements an Evaluation Integrity Protocol (EIP) for dataset, metrics and reproducibility consistency.

TensorFlow is an open-source machine learning framework developed by Google. It provides strong support for various platforms, especially Linux, and is widely adopted in the industry due to its active community and production-ready capabilities.
Machine Learning based framework for estimation of Effective Population Size(Ne) from genetic summary statistics

A comprehensive machine learning framework for analyzing and predicting crude oil shipping risks across multiple transport modes (pipelines, storage, road, and vessels) using Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks. This project incorporates advanced risk analytics including market risk, PD, expected credit loss, and insurance risk modeling.

Applied causal machine learning and statistical analysis within a DAG-based framework to evaluate the effect of treatment (scholarship) on the outcome (student dropout). Demonstrated the causal impact of financial support on reducing dropout and uncovered heterogeneous treatment effects.
Code repository for the publication "STROKE-ASSIST: a novel machine learning framework for stroke type identification in resource-constrained settings resilient to missing data"
Minerva is a framework for training machine learning models for researchers.
The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.
A Machine Learning Framework for Comprehensive Classification of Plant Transcription Factors

Cerebrus is an intelligent malware analysis framework designed to provide multi-layered defense against modern cyber threats. It integrates static analysis, machine learning, external threat intelligence, and explainable AI (XAI) to deliver a robust platform for detecting known and unknown malware across various file formats.

This repository contains the implementation of a hybrid physics-machine learning framework for autonomous pH adjustment in complex buffered systems. The system combines Theoretical Titration Curve Generation modeling with active learning to enable rapid, precise pH optimization using low-cost automated hardware.

Proposed solution introduces a Machine Learning (ML) driven Battery Management System that intelligently estimates the State of Health (SOH)  and predicts the Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of EV batterie

This project aims to bridge this gap by building a complete credit risk classification pipeline that delivers predictive accuracy while also providing thorough interpretability through two widely used explainability frameworks
Project for Applied Machine Learning 2, attempting to discover optimal noise profiles through an uncertainty-aware multi-generator evolutionary framework for GANs.
Framework for experiments regarding the mass estimation of massive objects in astrophysical collision-driven systems using machine learning models

ChatGPT said:  An AI-driven framework that optimizes crop selection and water management using climate, soil, and rainfall data. It leverages machine learning to recommend sustainable, region-specific crops and predict water availability, promoting climate-resilient and resource-efficient farming practices.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
A Course on Educative.io about Machine learning with NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, and more. Learn data analysis, feature engineering, and deep learning using industry-standard frameworks.

Machine learning framework predicting U.S. county-level opioid cost per capita (20132023) by integrating Pharmacy Benefit Management (PBM) levers and Social Determinants of Health (SDOH). Includes data pipelines, simulation code, and reproducible figures.
The AIP-G 1.0 (Alzheimers disease, Inhibitor Predictor for GSK-3, version 1.0) pipeline implements a two-stage machine learning framework for predicting GSK-3 inhibitors for Alzheimers disease.

This project implements the Double Machine Learning (DML) framework to estimate heterogeneous treatment effects using high-dimensional data. It includes synthetic data generation, cross-fitting, residualization, nuisance modeling with ML algorithms, and final ATE estimation with detailedevaluation.

Collection of projects applying data science and quantitative finance techniques  from portfolio optimization and CAPM estimation to machine learning and ESG event analysis  to explore real-world financial datasets and decision-making frameworks.

This repository explores Machine Learning through projects, scripts, and tutorials. It covers data preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and deployment using frameworks like scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, with applications in classification, regression, NLP, and computer vision.
A curated list of awesome Machine Learning frameworks, libraries and software. With repository stars and forks

HybridLinkSim is a simulation framework for modeling, analyzing, and comparing Radio Frequency (RF) and optical communication links in space missions. It integrates atmospheric attenuation models, link budget analysis, and machine learningbased performance prediction across multiple orbital scenarios (LEO, GEO, and Lunar).
